name: Overboard (itch) (Neurotic Bear Den)
description: A first-person puzzle and ambient horror game loosely based on Elder God mythology. A man finds himself awoken to the sounds of violence on a cruise liner. He finds the room he is in locked, with a mysterious puzzle in front of him. Discover what happened to his ship, and why! Created with a small team of seven people, this game will be featured in the stream for Final Projects on July 20th.
